TEXT.TITLE: NATIONAL CITY CORP <NCTY.O> 1ST QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr primary 87 cts vs 83 cts Shr diluted 85 cts vs 74 cts Net 35.9 mln vs 30.6 mln Avg shrs 41.0 mln vs 34.2 mln Assets 13.95 billion vs 12.34 billion Deposits 10.21 billion vs 9.24 billion Loans 9.22 billion vs 7.89 billion Return on assets 1.07 pct vs 1.05 pct Note: Net includes securities gains of seven cts a shr vs two cts. Net includes loan loss provision of 20.2 mln vs 12.6 mln. Net charge-offs totaled 15.6 mln, brining the loan loss reserve at the end of the qtr to 120.5 mln. Reuter
